title: Finding the Facts in Science Fiction: How to Create the Perfect Halloween Lesson
description: Do you teach science? Do you like science fiction? Do you like acting and Halloween? If you answered yes to any of these questions, then this is the book for you. Learn about our author's experiences with teaching and Halloween. Discover how to take your favorite science fiction movies and characters and turn them into meaningful, cross-curricular Halloween activities that your students will never forget.
author: Steven Kordosky
